attributes.action: limit the terms for pensions and retirement benefits for Local Councillors, MSP's, MP's and MEP's to the average of the terms for Private Sector employees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Private Sector is the source of all public expenditure and retirement benefits for those we elect.  It is unfair for the elected to legislate generous terms for themselves and then create circumstances that deny the same benefits to the general population.  Limits like those proposed here would encourage legislators to remove the present inequalities, and would help restore respect for those we elect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
